column5: Guys looking to upgrade my 24 lb trolling motor. It has seen it's better day. I have an old 14 aluminum v-hull that has 3 swivel seats, a 9 hp sea king, and it isn't overly heavy, do a lot of pond hopping and small lakes in the midwest. I would appreciate any insight to the proper thrust I need, brand name, or is the bass pro shop brand ok? Thinking of something in the 40-55 lb. thrust to really get me around. Also surely I don't need a 42" shaft do I...thanks for the help as always gals and guys.
Not to be biased but check out what I am selling.  This moves my 16' deep hull lund good so your little tinny would really book!  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=6589
So Shad lets do the deal..is this an endura???? 46 lbs thrust right...are you shipping out of USA??? how much would that cost???? Or how would this work.
Yes it is an endura, 46lb thrust.  Not shipping out of the USA; I live in the steel city dude.  It would cost gas money to meet me 1/2 way from where you are if your in the gta; where ya from dude?
Live near Omaha, NE...in southwest Iowa.
